attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
investing heavily in high speed rail networks across the uk.

boosting our renewable energy fast looking at solar , tidal, wave, energy not just wind power , improving the electricity grid .

bringing hydrogen powered vehicels onto our roads encouraging car manufactures to start producing hydro cars, filling stations across the country and we need to  produce the hydrogen in this country creating more and new jobs all over the country.

clean energy , sustainable communities
with soalr panels fitted to roofs ,energy efficent,well insulated  housing, allotments shared by eniter community , and several small wind turbines . bringing communities closer 

our resycling has to dramatically improve as a service to communities we need councils to supply several boxes each for different materials one for plastics, another for paper and carboard, and so on. we also need to process our rubbish in this country not ferrying it to china which completely  undermines why we rescycle,we need to push supermarkets to dramatically reduce the amount of packaging in their stores and ban the use of all plastic bags, and finally we need to be able to rescyle all plastics through council collections
